# NextCore AI Portal

Modern Next.js web portal for the NextCore AI RTO SaaS platform.

This repository contains the **frontend web application** that connects to the [NextCore-AI-Backend](https://github.com/nick-syspac/NextCore-AI-Backend) Django REST API.
